titles.title: Nonprofit Organizations Tax-Exempt Bond Reform Act of 1993
To amend the Internal Revenue Code 1986 to generally treat bonds issued for section 501(c)(3)organizations in a manner similar to governmental bonds.

action.text: Sponsor introductory remarks on measure. (CR E1175)
Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

committee.name: House Committee on Ways and Means

action.text: Hearing Held on Issue by Subcommittee on Select Revenue Measures.

bill.summary: 5/6/1993--Introduced. Nonprofit Organizations Tax-Exempt Bond Reform Act of 1993 - Amends the Internal Revenue Code to provide for the tax treatment of bonds of certain nonprofit tax-exempt organizations in a manner similar to governmental bonds.
